channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- WebLM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- WebLM

item.title: CVE-2020-7032|2024-09-17T01:45:48.139Z -- avaya -- weblm
item.description: An XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in Avaya WebLM admin interface allows authenticated users to read arbitrary files or conduct server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks via a crafted DTD in an XML request. Affected versions of Avaya WebLM include: 7.0 through 7.1.3.6 and 8.0 through 8.1.2.
